chapters.title: Chapter 39:  Threads in the Pattern
chapters.info: Tigraine Damodred, p. 445 (357)—Elayne's step-mother, in a way (her father's first wife). Both Elayne and Coline say that Rand looks like her, although neither of them thinks Tigraine could possibly be Rand's mother.... She is also Galad's mother. See also al'Thor, Rand; Damodred, Galadedrid; Trakand, Elayne; Trakand, Morgase.
